title: Duel Masters VSRF
alternative_title: Duel Masters Versus Revolution Final, デュエル・マスターズVSRF
description: The new series will feature talking hamsters, as well as "amazing transfer students" who appear one after another. The video also confirms that Katta Kirifuda, the younger brother of the previous franchise lead Shoubu Kirifuda, will continue to star in the series.
